Messages.Message: Welcome to the Cashier Local App! 🎉
This is a sample message demonstrating the Vue 3 + TypeScript + Electron.NET stack.
LiteDB is working perfectly for local data storage! 📁
Try adding your own message using the form above ⬆️
The frontend is built with Vue 3 Composition API and TypeScript for better development experience.
All API calls are handled through Vue composables for better code organization! 🚀
